en.how_2: KUMA - A karaoke editor for Dragon Engine games.
en.how_3: To begin using the tool, you can add start by loading an existing file from File -> Open or just by adding notes to a new file.
en.how_4: You can choose your preferred controller type and language using the dropdown menus at the top of the screen.
en.how_5: When placing a note, the accuracy is %{ms} milliseconds. You can change the position more accurately in note edit mode.'
en.how_6: You can play songs by loading them from the Music tab and then pressing the Play button in the left corner.
en.how_7: If you want to save, you can save by going to File -> Save or Save as... to either create a new file or overwrite an existing one.
en.how_9: Left click - Place and pick up notes.
en.how_11: E - Note edit mode. You can accurately change note timings, position, type and more. Pressing E again saves the note.
en.how_12: Arrow keys, Page Up, Page Down - Move the scrollbar.
en.how_19: Left Ctrl + V - Paste copied notes (Vertical position does not change).
en.how_20: Left Ctrl + Left Shift + V - Paste copied notes (Vertical position changes).
en.about_1: A karaoke editor for Dragon Engine games.
